trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DisplayStyleChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ToolStripItem1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DisplayStyleChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> references.
trans-unit.target: 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 <see langword="Dispose" /> 时已释放的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要停靠在其父控件上的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 边框，并确定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 如何随其父控件一起调整大小。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.None" />。

trans-unit.source: This property applies only to flow layouts.
trans-unit.target: 此属性仅适用于流布局。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>属性来定义如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>调整其父控件的大小时是否自动调整大小。

trans-unit.source: For example, setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 例如，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left>导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>将其自身对齐其父控件的左边缘和根据父控件一起调整大小调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth).
trans-unit.target: 控件停靠在其 Z 顺序，即沿窗体的 z 轴 （深度） 窗体上控件的可视化分层。

trans-unit.source: A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container.
trans-unit.target: 控件可以停靠到其父容器的一个边或可以停靠到所有边缘和填充的父容器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A> properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Anchor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Dock%2A>属性是互相排斥。

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 只有一个可以设置一次和最后一个组将优先。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The object to be dragged.
trans-unit.target: 要拖动的对象。

trans-unit.source: The drag operations that can occur.
trans-unit.target: 可发生的拖动操作。

trans-unit.source: Begins a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 开始拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: If the drag operation needs to interact with applications in another process, the `data` parameter must either be a base managed class (such as <xref:System.String?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or <xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile?displayProperty=nameWithType>), an object that implements <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or an object that implements <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 如果在拖动操作需要与另一个进程中的应用程序交互`data`参数必须是托管的基类 (如<xref:System.String?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或<xref:System.Drawing.Imaging.Metafile?displayProperty=nameWithType>)，实现的对象<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或对象实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the item is double-clicked with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当用鼠标双击项时发生。

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 由用户的操作系统的鼠标设置确定一次双击。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以设置两次单击鼠标按钮之间的时间以便将这两次单击认为是双击而不是两次单击。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event is raised every time a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>每次双击控件时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have two event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick> events of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick> events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有两个事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>双击窗体，这两种方法调用时将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If an item is double-clicked that does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick> event, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event might be raised twice.
trans-unit.target: 如果项是双击，不支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>事件，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>事件，可能会引发两次。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ToolStripItem1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> can be activated by double-clicking the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示通过双击鼠标能否激活 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> can be activated by double-clicking the mouse; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过双击鼠标能够激活 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user drags an item and the user releases the mouse button, indicating that the item should be dropped into this item.
trans-unit.target: 当用户拖动某项后再释放鼠标按钮时发生，指示此项应该被放入该项内。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>位于屏幕坐标，未工作区坐标。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to convert the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties to a client <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将转换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>属性设置为客户端<xref:System.Drawing.Point>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user drags an item into the client area of this item.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将某项拖动到该项的工作区内时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter> event is raised when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the item during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>用户拖放操作过程中首次将鼠标光标拖到项时将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 下面的备注描述如何以及何时引发与拖放操作相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the item under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>方法确定当前光标位置下的项。

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 然后检查以查看项是否为有效的放置目标。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果项是有效的放置目标，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>产生指定的拖放效果引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 枚举。

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner:
trans-unit.target: 按以下方式跟踪的更改的鼠标光标位置、 键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态：

trans-unit.source: If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse enters another item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标进入另一个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>引发该控件。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态，更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据或取消该操作基于值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>属性的事件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Continue>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Continue>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>引发事件以继续操作和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>产生新效果引发事件，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 枚举。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标时，用户提供的最新反馈有关鼠标位置，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop>, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop>、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs> are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs>位于屏幕坐标，未工作区坐标。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to convert the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A> properties to a client <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将转换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.X%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs.Y%2A>属性设置为客户端<xref:System.Drawing.Point>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user drags an item and the mouse pointer is no longer over the client area of this item.
trans-unit.target: 当用户拖动某项并且鼠标指针不再悬停在此项的工作区上方时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised when the user drags the cursor out of the control or the user cancels the current drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>用户拖出控件的光标或用户取消当前的拖放操作时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 下面的备注描述如何以及何时引发与拖放操作相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the item under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>方法确定当前光标位置下的项。

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 然后检查以查看项是否为有效的放置目标。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果项是有效的放置目标，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>产生指定的拖放效果引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 枚举。

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner:
trans-unit.target: 按以下方式跟踪的更改的鼠标光标位置、 键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态：

trans-unit.source: If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse enters another item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标进入另一个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>引发该控件。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态，更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据或取消该操作基于值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>属性的事件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Continue>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Continue>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>引发事件以继续操作和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>产生新效果引发事件，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 枚举。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标时，用户提供的最新反馈有关鼠标位置，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop>, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop>、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ToolStripItem1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user drags an item over the client area of this item.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将某项拖动到此项的工作区上方时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised when the mouse cursor moves within the bounds of the control during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>鼠标光标拖放操作期间的控件的边界内移动时将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parent control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用了 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的父控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the parent control of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的父控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled" /> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled" /> 属性值更改后发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Enabled%2A>通过以编程方式修改或用户交互更改属性。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.EnabledChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.EnabledChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raise this event with specific property settings.
trans-unit.target: 引发此事件具有特定属性设置。

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由该项显示的文本的字体。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to the text displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 显示的文本的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DefaultFont" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Font%2A> property to get or set the font that will be used by default for painting and text in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.

trans-unit.target: 项的前景 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />。

trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColorChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ToolStripItem1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ForeColorChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> that is the container of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 检索作为当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的容器的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> that is the container of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />，它是当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的容器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GetCurrentParent%2A> is a read-only accessor to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Parent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GetCurrentParent%2A> 是对只读访问器<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Parent%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A parent differs from an owner in that a parent denotes the returned current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in which the item is displayed, which might be in the overflow area.
trans-unit.target: 父与不同所有者的父表示返回的当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>在其中将显示该项，这可能会溢出区域中。

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的自定义大小的区域。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fit.
trans-unit.target: 检索可以容纳控件的矩形区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> ordered pair, representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 排序对，表示矩形的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 在执行拖动操作期间发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>启动拖放操作时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback> event allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GiveFeedback>事件允许拖动事件，以便为用户可视反馈提供拖放操作期间修改鼠标指针的外观的源。

trans-unit.source: The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 下面的备注描述如何以及何时引发与拖放操作相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the item under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>方法确定当前光标位置下的项。

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 然后检查以查看项是否为有效的放置目标。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果项是有效的放置目标，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>产生指定的拖放效果引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 枚举。

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner:
trans-unit.target: 按以下方式跟踪的更改的鼠标光标位置、 键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态：

trans-unit.source: If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse enters another item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标进入另一个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>引发该控件。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态，更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据或取消该操作基于值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>属性的事件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Continue>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Continue>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>引发事件以继续操作和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>产生新效果引发事件，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 枚举。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标时，用户提供的最新反馈有关鼠标位置，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop>, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop>、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ToolStripItem1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the height, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示高度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 上的图像。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>属性与图像处理的各个方面。

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控件通过设置这些属性直接或通过设置运行-– 仅限时间<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 图像缩放由属性中的交互<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> 是所确定的最终图像的图像的组合按比例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>设置和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>设置。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`true`（默认值） 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>，会发生任何图像缩放，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大项或规定的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>，既不映像也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>会进行缩放。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DisplayStyle%2A> , and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A> properties for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DisplayStyle%2A> ，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the image on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 上的图像对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment.MiddleLeft" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment.MiddleLeft" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A> property to get or set image alignment on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>属性来获取或设置图像对齐方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A> property to get or set text alignment on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A>属性来获取或设置文本对齐方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 图像缩放由属性中的交互<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> 是所确定的最终图像的图像的组合按比例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>设置和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>设置。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`true`（默认值） 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>，会发生任何图像缩放，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大项或规定的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>，既不映像也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>会进行缩放。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index value of the image that is displayed on the item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在该项上显示的图像的索引值。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the image in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList" /> that is displayed for the item.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList" /> 中为该项显示的图像的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, signifying that the image list is empty.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 -1，表明图像列表为空。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A> property specifies the position of the image in the image list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>属性的图像列表中指定的映像的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A> property specifies the image itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>属性指定图像本身。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>属性与图像处理的各个方面。

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控件通过设置这些属性直接或通过设置运行-– 仅限时间<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 图像缩放由属性中的交互<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>、，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> 是所确定的最终图像的图像的组合按比例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>设置和容器的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>设置。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`true`（默认值） 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.SizeToFit>，会发生任何图像缩放，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>大小是最大项或规定的最小大小。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>是`false`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling.None>，既不映像也不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>会进行缩放。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值小于 -1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key accessor for the image in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList" /> that is displayed on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList" /> 上的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 中图像的键访问器。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the key of the image.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示图像的键的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A> property specifies the position of the image in the image list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>属性的图像列表中指定的映像的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A> property specifies the image itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>属性指定图像本身。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageTransparentColor%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageTransparentColor%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: In addition, it demonstrates how to set and show a custom ToolTip for the item.
trans-unit.target: 此外，它演示了如何设置和显示项的自定义工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color to treat as transparent in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 图像中被视为透明的颜色。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageTransparentColor%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageTransparentColor%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: In addition, it demonstrates how to set and show a custom ToolTip for the item.
trans-unit.target: 此外，它演示了如何设置和显示项的自定义工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates some or all of the surface of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> and causes it to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的部分或整个图面无效并导致重绘该部分或整个图面。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the entire surface of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> and causes it to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的整个图面无效并导致重绘该图面。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Invalidate%2A> method for custom rendering.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Invalidate%2A>进行自定义呈现的方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>类。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the region to invalidate.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示要使之无效的区域。

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the specified region of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> by adding it to the update region of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />, which is the area that will be repainted at the next paint operation, and causes a paint message to be sent to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的指定区域添加到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的更新区域（即下次执行绘制操作时将重新绘制的区域）使该指定区域无效，并导致向 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 发送绘制消息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示对象是否已被释放。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control has been disposed of; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件已经被释放，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的字符。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the item recognizes.
trans-unit.target: 确定字符是否为该项可识别的输入字符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the character should be sent directly to the item and not preprocessed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符应直接发送到该项而不必经过预处理，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 在窗口消息预处理，以确定是否应经过预处理，或直接发送到给定的输入的字符过程中调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A> method returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>方法返回`true`，指定的字符将直接发送到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: However, if the method returns `false`, the character is preprocessed and only sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果该方法返回`false`，字符被预处理并仅发送到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>如果它不使用预处理阶段时。

trans-unit.source: The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.
trans-unit.target: 字符的预处理包括检查的字符是否另一个控件的助记键。

trans-unit.source: For all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 为用于继承类来调用此方法的所有窗口。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: the <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />值 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的键是常规输入键还是需要预处理的特殊键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的键是常规输入键，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A> method during window-message preprocessing to determine whether the specified key is a regular input key that should be sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> or a special key (such as PAGE UP, PAGE DOWN, ENTER, ESC, TAB, or arrow keys) that should be preprocessed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputChar%2A>方法在窗口消息预处理以确定是否指定的键是常规输入的键，应直接发送期间<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>还是 （如 PAGE UP、 PAGE DOWN、 ENTER、 ESC、 选项卡上或箭头键） 的特殊键，应进行预处理。

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, the key is sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> only if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: 在后一种情况，密钥将发送到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>仅当它不使用预处理阶段时。

trans-unit.source: For all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 为用于继承类来调用此方法的所有窗口。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: the <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />值 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the container of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 的容器是否是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the container of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> 的容器是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" />，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.IsOnDropDown%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.IsOnDropDown%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement.Overflow" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement" /> 属性是否设置为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement.Overflow" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement.Overflow" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement" /> 属性设置为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement.Overflow" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the location of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is updated.
trans-unit.target: 当更新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的位置时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is updated by either a programmatic modification or through interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>通过以编程方式修改或通过交互更新。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.LocationChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.LocationChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raise this event with specific property settings.
trans-unit.target: 引发此事件具有特定属性设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.LocationChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.LocationChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.LocationChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ToolStripItem1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.LocationChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between the item and adjacent items.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置项与相邻项之间的间距。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the space between the item and adjacent items.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />，表示项与相邻项之间的间距。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how child menus are merged with parent menus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置如何将子菜单与父菜单合并。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MergeAction" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MergeAction" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.MergeAction.MatchOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.MergeAction.MatchOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MergeAction" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MergeAction" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of a merged item within the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置合并的项在当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 内的位置。

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the index of the merged item, if a match is found, or -1 if a match is not found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到匹配项，将显示表示合并项的索引的整数；如果找不到匹配项，将显示 -1。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MergeIndex%2A> property to get or set the index of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> so that you can access it for menu-merging operations.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MergeIndex%2A>属性来获取或设置的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>，以便你可以访问它菜单合并操作。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MergeIndex%2A> property to insert a merged <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> in a specific location.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MergeIndex%2A>属性将插入合并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>在特定位置。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager>类概述。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the item is attached to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton" /> or can float between the two.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置该项应附加到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton" />，还是漂浮在两者之间。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow.AsNeeded" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow.AsNeeded" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property in stack layouts.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>堆栈为布局中的属性。

trans-unit.source: In flow and table layouts, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> overflow button is not rendered, and therefore the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在流和表布局中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不呈现溢出按钮，并因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>忽略属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextDirection%2A> properties, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Text%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextDirection%2A>属性以及如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> named `movingToolStrip` and call `InitializeMovingToolStrip` in the form's constructor or `Load` event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>名为`movingToolStrip`并调用`InitializeMovingToolStrip`窗体的构造函数中或`Load`事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the owner of this item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此项的所有者。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> that owns or is to own the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 拥有或即将拥有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A> returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> whose Items collection contains the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A> 返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>其项集合包含当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: This is the best way to reference <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> or other properties in the top-level <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> without writing special code to handle overflow.
trans-unit.target: 这是引用的最佳方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>或其他属性位于顶级<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>而无需编写特殊的代码来处理溢出。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A> remains the same even if the item falls into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A>保持不变，即使项属于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A> can be `null` for certain elements that are in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A> collection but not in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A>可以是`null`的某些元素，位于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A>集合但未显示在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A> property for custom rendering.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Owner%2A>进行自定义呈现的属性。

trans-unit.target: 更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OwnerChanged>事件。

trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OwnerChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
