trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OwnerChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ToolStripItem1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OwnerChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的父级 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The parent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的父级 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OwnerItem%2A> of an **Open**<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> would typically be a **File**<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.OwnerItem%2A>的**打开**<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>端口通常是**文件**<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the internal spacing, in pixels, between the item's contents and its edges.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置项的内容与其边缘之间的内部间距（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" /> representing the item's internal spacing, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Padding" />，表示项的内部间距（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the item is redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 在重绘项时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Paint>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ToolStripItem1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Paint>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the parent container of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的父容器。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> that is the parent container of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />，它是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的父容器。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GetCurrentParent%2A> is a read-only accessor to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Parent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GetCurrentParent%2A> 是对只读访问器<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Parent%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: A parent differs from an owner in that a parent denotes the returned current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> in which the item is displayed, which might be in the overflow area.
trans-unit.target: 父与不同所有者的父表示返回的当前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>在其中将显示该项，这可能会溢出区域中。

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> raises paint events and so on, while the owner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> contains shared data such as image lists.
trans-unit.target: 父<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>引发绘制事件等，而所有者<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>包含共享的数据，例如图像列表。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Parent%2A> property is set by the layout manager on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Parent%2A>由布局管理器上设置属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。

trans-unit.source: Generates a <see langword="Click" /> event for a <see langword="ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="ToolStripItem" /> 生成 <see langword="Click" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current layout of the item.
trans-unit.target: 获取项的当前布局。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemPlacement" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted> event to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutCompleted>事件，以确定某项放在主<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，溢出<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>，或如果当前根本未显示。

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow.Never>.
trans-unit.target: 为什么不显示项的通常原因是，在主无法容纳该项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>及其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow.Never>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property for custom rendering.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>进行自定义呈现的属性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the state of the item is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示该项是否处于按下状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the state of the item is pressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该项处于按下状态，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: 通过引用传递的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />，表示要处理的窗口消息。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值之一，表示要处理的键。

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: 处理命令键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys.
trans-unit.target: 在消息预处理以处理命令键过程中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys.
trans-unit.target: 命令键是始终优先于常规输入键的键。

trans-unit.source: Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: 命令键的示例包括快捷键和菜单快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key.
trans-unit.target: 该方法必须返回`true`以指示它已处理命令键，或`false`以指示该密钥不是命令键。

trans-unit.source: The base-class implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ProcessCmdKey%2A> method returns `false` in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 基类实现<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ProcessCmdKey%2A>方法返回`false`在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: for the immediate caller and inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方和继承类来调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ProcessCmdKey(System.Windows.Forms.Message@,System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> method in a derived class, the method override should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ProcessCmdKey(System.Windows.Forms.Message@,System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" />派生类中的方法，该方法重写应返回<see langword="true" />以指示它已处理该键。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类将很少，如果有，需要重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值之一，表示要处理的键。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: 处理对话框键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果键已由该项处理，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the ENTER and SPACEBAR keys in order to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 消息处理 enter 键，并按空格键密钥，以便引发预处理过程中调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the item is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: 仅当调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A>方法指示该项未在处理该键。

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 为用于继承类来调用此方法的所有窗口。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see langword="AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举：<see langword="AllWindows" />值<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> method in a derived class, the overriding implementation should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" />派生类中的方法，重写实现应返回<see langword="true" />以指示它已处理该键。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类将很少，如果有，需要重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的字符。

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 处理助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called to give an item the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法为项提供机会处理助记键字符。

trans-unit.source: The method should determine whether the item is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: 方法应确定项目是否处于处理助记键的状态，以及是否给定的字符是否表示助记键。

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过因此，此方法应执行与助记键并返回关联的操作`true`。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，该方法应返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: This base-class implementation relies on the host <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 此基类实现依赖于主机<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>控件才能调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A>方法来确定给定的字符是否匹配项的文本中助记键。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event and returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，该方法将引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>事件，并返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 为用于继承类来调用此方法的所有窗口。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see langword="AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举：<see langword="AllWindows" />值<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an accessibility client application invokes help for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 当具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序调用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的帮助时发生。

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to allow users to invoke help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key.
trans-unit.target: 应使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>类以允许用户通过按 F1 键来调用你可访问的对象的帮助。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> provides you with complete information in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>中的完整信息为您提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryAccessibilityHelp> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryAccessibilityHelp>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryAccessibilityHelp> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ToolStripItem1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryAccessibilityHelp>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: 在拖放操作期间发生，并且允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>拖放操作期间键盘或鼠标按钮状态更改时引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag> event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>事件允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: The following remarks describe how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised.
trans-unit.target: 下面的备注描述如何以及何时引发与拖放操作相关的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A> method determines the item under the current cursor location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DoDragDrop%2A>方法确定当前光标位置下的项。

trans-unit.source: It then checks to see if the item is a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 然后检查以查看项是否为有效的放置目标。

trans-unit.source: If the item is a valid drop target, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果项是有效的放置目标，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>产生指定的拖放效果引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关拖放效果的列表，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 枚举。

trans-unit.source: Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked in the following manner:
trans-unit.target: 按以下方式跟踪的更改的鼠标光标位置、 键盘状态和鼠标按钮状态：

trans-unit.source: If the user moves out of a window, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户移出一个窗口，则引发 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> 事件。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse enters another item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter> for that control is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标进入另一个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragEnter>引发该控件。

trans-unit.source: If the mouse moves but stays within the same item, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果鼠标移动但停留在同一个项，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag> event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> property of the event's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘或鼠标按钮状态，更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>事件引发，并确定是否继续拖动、 放置数据或取消该操作基于值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A>属性的事件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Continue`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> event is raised to continue the operation and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Continue`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>引发事件以继续操作和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>产生新效果引发事件，从而能够设置适当的视觉反馈。

trans-unit.source: For a list of valid drop effects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关有效放置效果的列表，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragDropEffects> 枚举。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback> events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position, as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragOver>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.GiveFeedback>事件成对发生，以便当鼠标移到放置目标时，用户提供的最新反馈有关鼠标位置，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Drop`、 向源返回放置效果值，以便源应用程序可以执行适当的操作的源数据; 例如，如果会剪切数据是移动操作。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction> is `Cancel`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction>是`Cancel`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragLeave>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ToolStripItem1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.QueryContinueDrag>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether items are to be placed from right to left and text is to be written from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示项的放置顺序和文本的写入顺序是否均为从右向左。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if items are to be placed from right to left and text is to be written from right to left; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果项的放置顺序和文本的写入顺序均为从右向左，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Mirrors automatically the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> image when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes" />.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 属性设置为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft" /> 时，将自动镜像 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.Yes" /> 图像。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to automatically mirror the image; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果自动镜像图像，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the size and location of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: Sets the size and location of the item.
trans-unit.target: 设置项的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to make the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要使 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 可见，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to the specified visible state.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 设置为指定的可见状态。

trans-unit.source: You typically override this method to change the visibility behavior of the control.
trans-unit.target: 通常，你重写此方法可以更改控件的可见性行为。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.SetVisibleCore%2A> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.SetVisibleCore%2A> method to force the visibility of the control to change.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.SetVisibleCore%2A>在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.SetVisibleCore%2A>方法，以强制要更改的控件的可见性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether to show or hide shortcut keys.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是显示还是隐藏快捷键。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show shortcut keys; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示快捷键，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Shortcut keys, such as CTRL+C for copying, provide keyboard alternatives to selecting a command with a mouse or other pointing device.
trans-unit.target: 键盘快捷方式，如 CTRL + C 进行复制，提供选择具有鼠标或其他指针设备的命令的键盘替代项。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置项的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />, representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示矩形的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragDrop" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DragDrop" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.System%23Windows%23Forms%23IDropTarget%23OnDragDrop%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.System%23Windows%23Forms%23IDropTarget%23OnDragDrop%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.System#Windows#Forms#IDropTarget#OnDragDrop(System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.System#Windows#Forms#IDropTarget#OnDragDrop(System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.System#Windows#Forms#IDropTarget#OnDragDrop(System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.System#Windows#Forms#IDropTarget#OnDragDrop(System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object that contains data about the item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含有关项的数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data about the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，其中包含有关控件的数据。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Tag%2A> property set to an active link.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>与其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Tag%2A>属性设置为活动链接。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is to be displayed on the item.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要显示在项上的文本。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the item's text.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示项的文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: You can create an access key to the item by adding an ampersand ("&") before a letter in the text value.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加一个与号 ("&") 的文本值中的字母前，你可以创建到项的访问密钥。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create Access Keys for Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-access-keys-for-windows-forms-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 为 Windows 窗体控件创建访问键](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-access-keys-for-windows-forms-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Text%2A> property as the default source for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Text%2A>属性的默认源作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>内容。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoToolTip%2A> to `false` to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A> as the source for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> content.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoToolTip%2A>到`false`使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A>作为源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>内容。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextDirection%2A> properties, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Text%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextDirection%2A>属性以及如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> named `movingToolStrip` and call `InitializeMovingToolStrip` in the form's constructor or `Load` event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>名为`movingToolStrip`并调用`InitializeMovingToolStrip`窗体的构造函数中或`Load`事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel" /> 上的文本的对齐方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment.MiddleRight" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment.MiddleRight" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A> property to get or set text alignment on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A>属性来获取或设置文本对齐方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A> property to get or set image alignment on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>属性来获取或设置图像对齐方式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DisplayStyle%2A> , and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A> properties for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.DisplayStyle%2A> ，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextAlign%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>类概述。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 分配的值不是 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Text" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Text" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enabled%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raise this event with specific property settings.
trans-unit.target: 引发此事件具有特定属性设置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含从继承的类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ToolStripItem1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其命名实例`ToolStripItem1`并确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the orientation of text used on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 上所用文本的方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextDirection" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextDirection%2A> properties, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Text%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextDirection%2A>属性以及如何处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click>事件。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> named `movingToolStrip` and call `InitializeMovingToolStrip` in the form's constructor or `Load` event handler.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>名为`movingToolStrip`并调用`InitializeMovingToolStrip`窗体的构造函数中或`Load`事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> text and image relative to each other.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 文本和图像相对于彼此的位置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation.ImageBeforeText" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation.ImageBeforeText" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextImageRelation%2A> property to define or determine the relative placement of the image with respect to the text on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.TextImageRelation%2A>属性以定义或确定图像相对于文本的相对位置上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: Items that lack an image, text, or both are treated as special cases so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> does not display a blank spot for the missing element or elements.
trans-unit.target: 中缺少映像、 文本或这两项，将被视为特殊情况下，以便<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>不会显示为缺少的一个或多个元素的空白处。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that appears as a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> for a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置作为控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> 显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示工具提示文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A> works only if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A> 工作原理才<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ShowItemToolTips%2A>设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoToolTip%2A> is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> property for the item is used as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.AutoToolTip%2A>设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>项的属性用作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageTransparentColor%2A> for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageTransparentColor%2A>为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>。

trans-unit.source: In addition, it demonstrates how to set and show a custom ToolTip for the item.
trans-unit.target: 此外，它演示了如何设置和显示项的自定义工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, if any.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 的名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 不应重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />, if any, or <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 的名称的 <see cref="T:System.String" />（如果有）；如果 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> 未命名，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否显示该项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item is displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果显示该项，为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Visible" /> 属性的值更改时发生。
